item.description:
Ladies, let's get together and try something different!  Have you ever enjoyed an entire Fondue Meal?  The Melting Pot in Bedford, not far from the Burlington Mall, has a "Girls'Night Out" special on Wednesday--an $11 or $13 savings depending on the option you choose.  All 3 courses are fondue (except for the "Choice of Salad" in the Salad option).  The appetizer is a choice of cheese fondue and the dessert is a choice of chocolate fondue.  Also, one drink is included. I've already been to The Melting Pot--the meal is delicous!

This event is a combined Meetup event with Social Fun

This is a popular event at The Melting Pot, so reservations are HIGHLY recommended and I will be making one.  Please keep this in mind.

 See the link below for details.

http://www.meltingpot.com/upload/locations/104/2011%20GNO%20Menu%20-%20Bedford.pdf

Or call The Melting Pot at 781-791-0529

Now on Wednesdays in 2011

Catch up with the girls for an evening of fun and interactive fondue!
Our well-priced Girls' Night menu is offered every Wednesday in 2011.
We will also feature services such as psychic medium, tarot and
palm readings, live music and henna tattoos, in addition to handbag,
jewelry, and other unique craft vendors on the following dates:  

 

 

Also included on February 16th
Psychic Medium Julianna Kallas**
Palm Reader, Roger Lashley**
Complimentary Henna Tattoos
by Musings Henna
La Di Da Designs Jewelry

The Psychic Medium and Palm Reader are optional and charge $20 for a 10 minute mini-reading.  Booking this ahead is recommended as they already have some appointments booked for that evening.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: The Melting Pot--Girls' Night Out
